original: @ga /rang grol phyag rgya chen po bzhugs so//
analyzed: @ga /rang grol phyag rgya chen po bzhugs so//
translated: The Great Seal of Self-Liberation

original: @##/_/chos sku ye shes mkha' 'gro la na mo/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta
analyzed: @##/_/chos sku ye shes mkha' 'gro la na mo/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta
translated: Homage to the dakini of the wisdom of the dharmakaya.🔽I pay homage to you, mind itself,🔽like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: bu yis/_/sems nyid khyod la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob
analyzed: bu yis/_/sems nyid khyod la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob
translated: In order to attain perfect buddhahood🔽and to purify ordinary thoughts,

original: 'dod pas/_/tha mal rnam rtog dag bya'i phyir/_/rang lus lhar gsal bla ma la//
analyzed: 'dod pas/_/tha mal rnam rtog dag bya'i phyir/_/rang lus lhar gsal bla ma la//
translated: I will visualize my body as the deity and🔽with pure, altruistic devotion

original: lhag bsam dag pa'i mos gus bya/_/bla ma yi dam mi dmigs shing /_/dngos
analyzed: lhag bsam dag pa'i mos gus bya/_/bla ma yi dam mi dmigs shing /_/dngos
translated: I will visualize the guru as inseparable from the yidam.🔽I will not think of anything,

original: dang dngos med la sogs pa/_/gang yang yid la mi bya bar/_/ma bcos snyug
analyzed: dang dngos med la sogs pa/_/gang yang yid la mi bya bar/_/ma bcos snyug
translated: such as the deity or the lack of deity,🔽but rest in the state of uncontrived naturalness.

original: ma'i ngang du bzhag_/rang sems ma yengs chos kyi sku/_/de la ma yengs sgom
analyzed: ma'i ngang du bzhag_/rang sems ma yengs chos kyi sku/_/de la ma yengs sgom
translated: The undistracted mind is the dharmakaya;🔽the key point of undistracted meditation

original: pa'i gnad/_/mtha' bral chen por rtogs par bya/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshhor skyur
analyzed: pa'i gnad/_/mtha' bral chen por rtogs par bya/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshhor skyur
translated: is to realize the great freedom from extremes.

original: byed pa'i/_/nyon mongs chags sdang rnam rtog 'di/_/skye med mtshhon cha rnon po
analyzed: byed pa'i/_/nyon mongs chags sdang rnam rtog 'di/_/skye med mtshhon cha rnon po
translated: These afflictive emotions, such as attachment and aversion,🔽which cause us to be cast into the ocean of samsara,🔽are the sharp weapon of nonorigination.

original: yis/_/rang bzhin med par bcad par bya/_/sdong po rtsha ba bcad gyur na/_/
analyzed: yis/_/rang bzhin med par bcad par bya/_/sdong po rtsha ba bcad gyur na/_/
translated: If the trunk of a tree is cut down,🔽its branches will not grow.

original: yal ga skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dwangs pa'i rgya mtshho la/_/chu sbur byung
analyzed: yal ga skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dwangs pa'i rgya mtshho la/_/chu sbur byung
translated: Just as when a water bubble arises🔽and dissolves in water,🔽so too are thoughts:

original: zhing chu la thim/_/de bzhin rnam par rtog pa yang /_/chos nyid min pa gzhan
analyzed: zhing chu la thim/_/de bzhin rnam par rtog pa yang /_/chos nyid min pa gzhan
translated: they are not separate from dharmatā.🔽Do not regard them as faults, but relax and rest.

original: med kyi/_/skyon du ma lta glod la zhog_/gang shar gang skyes de nyid la/_/der
analyzed: med kyi/_/skyon du ma lta glod la zhog_/gang shar gang skyes de nyid la/_/der
translated: Whatever arises or occurs is liberated in its own place,🔽without being grasped as this or that.

original: 'dzin med par rang sar grol/_/snang grags chos rnams rang gi sems/_/
analyzed: 'dzin med par rang sar grol/_/snang grags chos rnams rang gi sems/_/
translated: All phenomena of appearances and sounds are one’s mind.🔽Apart from the mind, there are no other phenomena.

original: sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan med/_/sems ni skye 'gag spros dang bral/_/
analyzed: sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan med/_/sems ni skye 'gag spros dang bral/_/
translated: The mind is free from the elaborations of arising and ceasing.🔽Even if one indulges in the five sense objects,

original: sems kyi de nyid shes pa nges/_/'dod yon lnga la spyad gyur kyang /_/chos nyid
analyzed: sems kyi de nyid shes pa nges/_/'dod yon lnga la spyad gyur kyang /_/chos nyid
translated: one does not stray from the state of dharmatā.🔽Just as when one arrives on an island of gold,

original: ngang las g.yos pa med/_/dper na gser gling phyin pa yis/_/sa rdo rtshal
analyzed: ngang las g.yos pa med/_/dper na gser gling phyin pa yis/_/sa rdo rtshal
translated: one will not find any ordinary stones or earth,🔽so too in the great dharmadhātu of equality,

original: bas mi rnyed ltar/_/mnyam nyid chos dbyings chen po la/_/spang blang mnyam
analyzed: bas mi rnyed ltar/_/mnyam nyid chos dbyings chen po la/_/spang blang mnyam
translated: there is nothing to adopt or reject.

original: bzhag rjes thob med/_/gang gi tshhe na mngon du gyur/_/de tshhe lhun gyis grub
analyzed: bzhag rjes thob med/_/gang gi tshhe na mngon du gyur/_/de tshhe lhun gyis grub
translated: it is spontaneously present.🔽It is like a wish-fulfilling gem

original: par 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i re 'dod skongs mdzad pa'i/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta
analyzed: par 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i re 'dod skongs mdzad pa'i/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta
translated: that fulfills the wishes of beings.🔽Know that there are three levels of individuals

original: bur 'gyur/_/gang zag dbang po rab 'bring gsum/_/blo yi rim par shes
analyzed: bur 'gyur/_/gang zag dbang po rab 'bring gsum/_/blo yi rim par shes
translated: according to their level of understanding.

original: par bya/_/rang grol phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ye shes mkha' 'gro ma ni gu mas🔽mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: par bya/_/rang grol phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ye shes mkha' 'gro ma ni gu mas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: The dakini of Timeless Awareness Niguma’s Naturally Liberated Great Perfection, called “Mahāmudrā of Self-Liberation,” is complete.

original: rang grol phyag rgya chen po bzhugs so//
analyzed: rang grol phyag rgya chen po bzhugs so//
translated: Mahāmudrā of Self-Liberation
